columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Result Finding record.

columns.name: LAB_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category number for the lab follow-up task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Completed


Open

columns.name: LAB_ASSIGNED_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is assigned responsibility for the follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen that is associated with this follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_TEST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the test that is associated with this follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order that is associated with the comm log follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_ADD_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant when the follow-up task was added or reopened.

columns.name: LAB_REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition that is associated with this follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_TYPE_REQ_FOLL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The follow-up type category number for the lab requisition follow-up task.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General Follow-up


Missing Items


Duplicate Entry


Reconcile Duplicate Entry


Missing Collection Items


Submitter Changed


Changed Recipient


QC Review


Held Interfaced Results


Patient Merged or Contact Moved


Comm Log

columns.name: LAB_ADDING_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is responsible for adding the follow-up task to the list.

columns.name: LAB_REMOVE_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is responsible for removing the follow-up task from the list.

columns.name: LAB_REQ_MISSING_ITM
columns.description: List of missing required requisition items.

columns.name: LAB_REC_MISSING_ITM
columns.description: List of missing recommended requisition items.

columns.name: RESULT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result type category number for the lab follow-up task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Endoscopy Finding


Sensitivity Comments


BLOOD - Single Division


Joint Exam


Tympanogram Result


Audiogram Result


Speech Audiometry


Acoustic Reflex


Lab Follow-Up


Lab Comm Log


Lab Requisition


RIS General Breast Problem


RIS Mammo Mass


RIS Mammo Calcification


RIS Mammo Architectural Distortion


RIS Mammo Asymmetric Density


RIS Mammo Misc


RIS Mammo Result


RIS Mammo Recommendations


Pathology Result


Lesion


RIS Result Finding Follow-up


RIS General Recommendations


Finding


Screening Program Pathology


Screening Program Recommendation


Dermatology Finding


Anatomy


Dental Finding


Dental Procedure


Soft Tissue Finding


Soft Tissue Group Finding

columns.name: LAB_DUE_TM
columns.description: The current due time for this lab follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_START_TM
columns.description: The current start time for this lab follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_REQ_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper that is associated with this follow-up task.

columns.name: LAB_REMOVE_TM
columns.description: The time the follow-up task was removed from the work list.

columns.name: LAB_ACTION_DT
columns.description: The date the next action will be executed for this follow-up record.

columns.name: LAB_ACTION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the follow-up action record that will be triggered at the next action date.

columns.name: LAB_ACTION_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the node record.

columns.name: ASSOC_LABORATORY_ID
columns.description: The laboratory that this follow-up task is associated with. This is the laboratory in which context the task was created or re-opened. It also can be manually set by the user.

columns.name: LAB_FU_SUBM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the submitter that is associated with this follow-up task record.

columns.name: LAB_FU_SUBM_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: LAB_RMV_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the UTC instant a task was removed from the work list.

columns.name: LAB_DUE_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Lab follow-up task due instant in UTC

columns.name: LAB_START_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Lab follow-up task start instant in UTC

columns.name: LAB_ADD_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Indicates the UTC instant a task was added to the work list, either initially or when a previously closed task was re-opened.
